hero.heading: Fresh from farm to your door
hero.subheading: JiriSewa connects farmers, riders, and consumers — cutting out middlemen so farmers earn more and you pay less.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Farmers list fresh produce with photos, prices, and available quantities directly from their farm.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Anyone traveling between towns posts their trip route and available cargo capacity.
howItWorks.step3Desc: You order fresh produce. A rider heading your way picks it up and delivers it to your door.

forFarmers.title: For Farmers
forFarmers.subtitle: Sell directly. Earn fairly.
forFarmers.benefit1: Set your own prices — no middlemen taking 75%
forFarmers.benefit2: Reach consumers in Kathmandu and beyond
forFarmers.benefit3: Get paid when your produce is delivered
forFarmers.benefit4: List in minutes with photos from your phone

forRiders.title: For Riders
forRiders.subtitle: You're already traveling. Start earning.
forRiders.benefit1: Earn money on trips you're already taking
forRiders.benefit4: Help connect rural farms to city kitchens

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers, riders, and consumers building a fairer food system in Nepal.
